Result.Title: Variations on two themes: Racial and ethnic patterns in the attainment of suburban residence

Result.Title: Variations in Immigrant Incorporation in the Neighborhoods of Amsterdam

Result.Title: Producing sociology: Time trends in authorship of journal articles, 1975–1986
